description.value: You slow down, focus, and take a careful shot. Make a ranged Strike with a weapon in the bow weapon group. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to the attack roll and ignore the target's @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.conditionitems.Concealed]{Concealed} condition. If the target is @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.conditionitems.Hidden]{Hidden}, reduce the flat check from being hidden from 11 to 5.
